description:
Kiyser describes himself as a mutt. Very mixed quarter heritage, American Indian, Mexican, White, Black, and certainly is an interesting mix.
I of course am looking for a few more gay guys to balance out the many straight guys.
And Kiyser, well, he is a bottom, and the bigger the better apparently. So I was eager to get him in.
Ironically though, he has not ever used a dildo. Probably too young to have bought one yet!
The toy he picked was a big wobbly one, and I worried it would be a bit tough to get inserted, but then he deep throated it, and I was like, "Ok, he can handle it." (And I am thinking he is certainly qualified to do some Serviced videos!)
He did struggle trying to find the right angle of entry and that particular dildo has no grasping point.
When I talk to bottoms, they don't usually like dildos, preferring the real thing. I think Kiyser had pretty much the same reaction. He used it for a bit, got off to it, then decided it wasn't so much fun.
BUT, it still got him close and he delivered an awesome load for us!
title: Kiyser - Toys
